db_columns.event_date: The date on which the event was logged
db_columns.event_timestamp: The time (in microseconds, UTC) at which the event was logged on the client
db_columns.event_params: A repeated record of the parameters associated with this event
db_columns.event_previous_timestamp: The time (in microseconds, UTC) at which the event was previously logged on the client
db_columns.event_value_in_usd: The currency-converted value (in USD) of the event's value parameter
db_columns.event_bundle_sequence_id: The sequential ID of the bundle in which these events were uploaded
db_columns.event_server_timestamp_offset: Timestamp offset between collection time and upload time in micros
db_columns.user_id: The user ID set via the setUserId API
db_columns.user_pseudo_id: The pseudonymous id (e.g., app instance ID) for the user
db_columns.user_properties: A repeated record of user properties set with the setUserProperty API
db_columns.user_first_touch_timestamp: The time (in microseconds) at which the user first opened the app or visited the site
db_columns.user_ltv: A record of Lifetime Value information about the user
db_columns.geo: A record of the user's geographic information
db_columns.app_info: A record of information on the app
db_columns.traffic_source: Name of the traffic source that first acquired the user
db_columns.stream_id: The numeric ID of the stream
db_columns.platform: The platform on which the app was built
db_columns.ecommerce: A record of information about ecommerce
db_columns.items: A repeated record of items included in this event
